meanings.definition: Timber sawed into rough planks or otherwise prepared for use in building.
meanings.sent1: The lumber was stacked neatly near the construction site.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used the lumber to build a new bookshelf.
meanings.sent3: The lumber decided to have a race to see who could build the fastest house.
meanings.sent4: The lumber stood tall like soldiers ready for duty in the construction project.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh lumber filled the air as the house took shape.

meanings.definition: Unused or unwanted articles that are stored away.
meanings.sent1: The basement was filled with old lumber from past projects.
meanings.sent2: She decided to clear out the clutter and donate the lumber to charity.
meanings.sent3: The lumber in the attic whispered stories of past owners to the new residents.
meanings.sent4: The clutter of lumber in the garage seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent5: The old lumber held memories of forgotten projects and dreams.
